missions:
1. Complete all of this week's Master Missions.

2. Defeat 30 enemies (excluding Servants and section bosses).

3. Defeat 15 Saber or Caster-class enemies.

4. Defeat 15 Archer or Rider-class enemies.

5. Defeat 15 Lancer, Assassin, or Berserker-class enemies.

6. Defeat 15 Male enemies.

7. Defeat 15 Demonic enemies.
